snippet: Nicholas Mina stole four pistols from fellow officers and used the weapons to help pay a drug debt, prosecutors said.
abstract: New York City Police Officer Nicholas Mina is arrested and charged with grand larceny, criminal possession of stolen property and criminal sale of a controlled substance, among other charges; prosecutors say Mina, addicted to prescription painkillers, stole four loaded pistols from the lockers of his fellow officers and used them to pay a drug debt to a Queens drug and gun dealer.
lead_paragraph: Nicholas Mina stole four pistols from fellow officers and used the weapons to help pay a drug debt, prosecutors said.
